amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Legal Services Corporation by $128 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding out of the International Trade Commission Salaries and Expenses account by $128 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 246 (Roll no. 218).
